name: RAIL RIDER (DoopsGame)
description:
Hello there! Welcome to your new job where you work as a turret pilot. You have to prevent the obstacles coming down from the top of your screen to the bottom. If you fail to do so your will lose your health and then eventually die once you have no more Health. Good Luck!

Controls:

A and D to move

Tap space to shoot

If your bullet passes through an object, its a powerup.
